auth.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is permanent.

auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth.title: App name
auth.resetPasswordSentDescription: We've sent password reset instructions to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and follow the link to create a new password.

auth.accountExists: You already have an account. Try logging in or resetting your password.
auth.verifyEmailResentSuccess: Please check your inbox for the new email verification!
auth.updatePasswordSuccessDescription: You can now go back to the app and log in with your new password.
auth.updatePasswordInvalidRecoveryLink: Invalid recovery link. Please try resetting your password again.

letsgo.title: Let's go!
letsgo.payment: To finalize everything and unlock your full training program, we just need to take care of the payment details.
letsgo.paymentMore: This ensures you get uninterrupted access to all the workouts, coaching insights, and progress tracking. Let's get you ready to start achieving those goals!
